```{r}
library(lme4)

toy_df$participant <- factor(toy_df$participant)
toy_df$item        <- factor(toy_df$item)
toy_df$color       <- factor(toy_df$color,  levels = c("absent", "present"))
toy_df$format      <- factor(toy_df$format, levels = c("per100", "perServing"))

fit <- glmer(
  correct ~ color * format + (1 | participant) + (1 | item),
  data = toy_df,
  family = binomial)

summary(fit)
```

```{r}
library(lme4)
library(sjPlot)

fit <- glmer(
  correct ~ color * format + (1 | participant) + (1 | item),
  data = toy_df,
  family = binomial)

tab_model(
  fit,
  show.re.var = TRUE,
  show.icc   = FALSE,
  show.aic   = TRUE,
  transform = "exp",
  pred.labels = c("(Intercept)", "Label present", "Per serving", "Label Ã— serving"),
  dv.labels = "Correct sugar estimate (0/1)",
  file = "glmer_table.html")
```
